channel.title: Error: /opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss -p .+/~beehiveth/entries/.+.html --follow --with-body --body-csss article --title ~beehiveth posts on ctrl-c.club --date-from-url .+/~beehiveth/entries/(.+).html --url-date-fmt %d%m%y --encoding utf-8 https://ctrl-c.club/~beehiveth/ -o ./feeds/beehiveth.xml

item.title: newslinkrss error: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str
item.link: data:/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss -p .+/~beehiveth/entries/.+.html --follow --with-body --body-csss article --title ~beehiveth posts on ctrl-c.club --date-from-url .+/~beehiveth/entries/(.+).html --url-date-fmt %d%m%y --encoding utf-8 https://ctrl-c.club/~beehiveth/ -o ./feeds/beehiveth.xml
item.description:
An error occurred when generating this feed.

Command line: /opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss -p .+/~beehiveth/entries/.+.html --follow --with-body --body-csss article --title ~beehiveth posts on ctrl-c.club --date-from-url .+/~beehiveth/entries/(.+).html --url-date-fmt %d%m%y --encoding utf-8 https://ctrl-c.club/~beehiveth/ -o ./feeds/beehiveth.xml

Exception: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str

Stack trace: 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 1838, in main
    make_feed(args)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 924, in make_feed
    req = get_start_page(args, session, base_attrs, link_grabber, curr_url)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 818, in get_start_page
    base_attrs.feed(page_content)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/lib/python3.10/html/parser.py", line 109, in feed
    self.rawdata = self.rawdata + data
TypeError: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str
